name: Serenade
overview: This is an odd one, you need to figure out how to serenade your heart's desire. The joystick doesn't work but you can use SPACE BAR to select a Classical piece of music from a menu, random keys play parts of random tunes, F-keys make your lothario stare at the moon (locks the keyboard), and LEFT ARROW quits back to the intro. You have four instruments to choose from, each with its own characteristics.
